sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action looks up the opportunity record details in Microsoft Dynamic CRM.

Inputs:

  • Opportunity ID - ID of the opportunity.

Outputs:

  • Opportunity Details - JSON object containing all the fields for the specified Opportunity ID.
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided Opportunity ID is invalid or not provided.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Dynamics CRM connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

This action looks up the opportunity record details in Microsoft Dynamic CRM.

Inputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Provided Opportunity ID is invalid or not provided.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Dynamics CRM connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
